doc.title: Prison Break

credit.role: Secret Service Agent at Press Conference
Panamanian policeman that intercepts Lincoln and Sofia on a side road while seeking a getaway route
Himself - Presenter of America's Most Wanted

doc.plot: An engineer (Wentworth Miller) installs himself in a prison he helped design, in order to help his brother (Dominic Purcell), a death-row inmate who insists he did not commit the crime for which he has been sentenced to die and help him escape.
